code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("green")

p5 = turtle.Turtle()
p5.color('white')
p5.shape('turtle')
p5.penup()
p5.goto(-120,-40)
p5.pendown()

guide.img: Now that we have created our fourth player, Let’s go ahead and create our next player with the same logic
Let’s create p5, set its colour to white and shape to a turtle
guide.code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("green")

p5 = turtle.Turtle()
p5.color('white')
p5.shape('turtle')

guide.img: Let’s set the position of p5 x to -120 like before, and reduce y by 30 pixels, therefore, setting it at -40
guide.code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("green")

p5 = turtle.Turtle()
p5.color('white')
p5.shape('turtle')
p5.penup()
p5.goto(-120,-40)
